New Records: The Marlins matched a season high with 12 runs and set a season high with 18 hits during the game.
Key Match Events: The game was a slugfest with both teams performing well offensively, resulting in a high-scoring contest.
Pre-Game Insights: The Marlins' hitting staff focused on mechanical adjustments for Kyle Stowers to improve his performance.
Post-Match Reflections: Marlins' manager Skip Schumaker praised Stowers' adjustments and performance, highlighting his growth in the league.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Family members, including Kyle Stowers' mom, attended the game to support him in his new uniform.
Others: The game was played at Coors Field, known for its high altitude and hitter-friendly conditions.
